titles.title: A resolution commending the University of North Carolina men's basketball team for winning the 2005 National Collegiate Athletic Association Division I Men's Basketball Championship.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 4/6/2005--Passed Senate without amendment. Commends the University of North Carolina Tarheels for winning the 2005 National Collegiate Athletic Association (NCAA) Division I Men's Basketball Championship.
